text: The 1892 New York Giants season was the franchise's 10th season. The team finished in eighth place in the National League with a 71-80 record, 30.5 games behind the Boston Beaneaters. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
